attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law to ensure that people charged with terrorism offences and being brought before the courts in this country are denied access to the legal aid fund to pay for their defence lawyers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not right that the taxpayers of this country who are the target of terrorists and under constant and enduring threat from them should then be required to contribute to their defence costs.  The law which allows this is reprehensible and the people should be given an opportunity to state, by way of a petition, if they are prepared to continue to pay for it.
